products.title: Stockholm Rosewood Pink Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Stockholm Rosewood Pink Roller Blind in Pink. Made to measure from £7.39 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Roller Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
This stunning Rosewood Pink Stockholm roller blind will brighten any room and offers wonderful light filtering, and moisture resistant properties, which means you can can achieve complete privacy without completely blocking light from coming into the room. This dusty rosewood pink fabric will look stunning paired with natural wooden tones or will offer a perfect splash of colour when hung in a cool, compemporary grey scheme. Our rollers are great for privacy and light control. 
 
At Swift Direct Blinds, we take quality seriously.  Not only are we situated in the heart of the Yorkshire textile industry, but our own company is also seeped with a rich history, with over 50 years experience making blinds and curtains for home up and down the country.  This pink roller blind not only comes with a fabulous 5 year guarantee, for extra peace of mind, but is made by our blind specialists and comes with caring customer-first service.

products.productdescription:

products.title: Stirlo Hot Pink
products.metadescription: Made to Measure Stirlo Hot Pink Roller Blind | Privacy, Dim-Out Fabric | blindsbypost
products.productdescription: Stirlo Hot Pink Plain Roller Blind The Stirlo range boast a fantastic range of dim-out privacy fabrics to compliment any room.  The fabric is composed of 100% Polyester and is rolled around a strong, rust free aluminium tube. The blind is supplied with a premium control mechanism with White chain used as standard, or a Nickel metal chain can be chosen above to upgrade. Supplied with the blinds are installation instructions and universal brackets suitable for top, side and face fixing. If   the width and the drop are greater than 1800mm, the fabric may be joined either by a stitch or weld dependant on our professional discretion.

products.title: Kerry Hot Pink Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Kerry Hot Pink Roller Blind. A 100% blackout fabric means this vibrant blind is perfect for the bedroom. Our roller blinds can cover almost any window going way over 3m in width.
products.productdescription: The aptly named Kerry Hot Pink is about as subtle as yelling PINK at the top of your voice. It will steal the show, no matter what room you put it in, from a neutral toned bedroom in desperate need of a bit of colour to a brashly painted playroom where no other blind will do. Completely blackout, it will keep you in comforting darkness on those days off when you are trying to enjoy that well earned lie in. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains.  Being fully blackout this fabric is perfect for privacy as it will prevent any light from passing through the material.  All of our blinds are sold with built-in child safety mechanisms. We adhere to the guidelines set out by the British Blind and Shutter Association and take safety extremely seriously. All blinds come with the relevant child safety instructions and warnings. Please ensure you follow the provided instructions and warnings carefully. Please visit www.makeitsafe.org.uk to find out more. All control chains supplied with our roller blinds will be approximately half the length of the drop. If you require a longer control chain, please get in touch once ordered and we can amend this for you.

Min Width: 200mm Max Width: 3048mm
 	Min Drop: 200mm Max Drop: 2913mm
 	Fabric Joins: Blinds with a width and drop greater than 1730mm may be joined. Dependant on the fabric patterns will be matched.
 	Fabric Composition: Polyester
 	Tube: Robust Aluminium Tube
 	Control: Sidewinder or Spring Control
 	Guarantee: 12 Months
 	Fittings: Included
